item.title: Eleven domestic workers arrested over illegal abortions in Hong Kong
item.description: Police stress they do not believe the women, in their 30s and 40s, are in a crime syndicate.

item.title: Wildfires force Turkey to close key waterway
item.description: The Dardanelles Strait serves as a key route for commercial shipping between Europe and Asia.

item.title: What we know about Israel's plan to take over Gaza City
item.description: The plan faces fierce opposition within Israel as well as international criticism.

item.title: Crocs US sales tumble as shoppers choose trainers
item.description: The rubber clog-maker claims it is competing with a "clear athletic trend" ahead of the World Cup.

item.title: Netanyahu divides Israelis and allies with plan for new military push in Gaza
item.description: The Israeli PM's proposals have provoked condemnation from the UK and the UN
